title: Rho-Alpha Unleashed: Microsoft’s Bid to Wire AI into Robots
description: Microsoft's Rho-alpha model fuses vision-language-action AI with tactile sensing, enabling robots to handle natural language commands in unstructured environments. Partnerships with NVIDIA, Hexagon, and others accelerate Physical AI from labs to factories.

title: Pope warns against risks of AI algorithms
description: Pope Leo XIV on Saturday stressed the risks of generative artificial intelligence, how it could usurp human identities and relationships, influence public opinion and deepen social polarisationThe post Pope warns against risks of AI algorithms appeared first on Vanguard News.
